name: Orthofix Medical Inc.
description: Orthofix Medical Inc. is a global medical device company focused on providing innovative solutions for the orthopedic and spine markets. Established in 1980 and headquartered in Lewisville, Texas, Orthofix is dedicated to improving patients' lives through advanced technologies and biologics. The company operates through two primary segments: Orthopedics and Spine. The Orthopedics segment offers a range of products including bone growth stimulators, fixation devices, and regenerative medicine solutions. These products are designed to enhance healing and improve patient outcomes in the treatment of orthopedic conditions. The Spine segment provides a variety of surgical solutions for spinal fusion and minimally invasive procedures, including implants and instrumentation that support spinal surgery. Orthofix is recognized for its commitment to research and development, continuously exploring new technologies and partnerships to expand its product offerings. With a strong focus on patient care and clinical efficacy, Orthofix aims to address the needs of healthcare providers and patients alike. The company is also actively involved in educating healthcare professionals on the latest advancements in orthopedic and spine care. Orthofix's mission is to deliver innovative and effective solutions that enhance patient recovery and improve quality of life.
